sectionDescription: Here are some of my recent projects. Click on any card to learn more.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.shortDescription: A website to catalog my projects. It's The very site you're on right now!
projects.description: A nice sleek website I made to display my projects and to blog about my thoughts. It is completely made in vanilla html,css,and js. Yeah, not much else to say.

projects.title: C# Console Dungeon Crawler
projects.shortDescription: A simple text-based dungeon crawler game.
projects.description: A C# project I made for class as well as to learn the language. It as attacking, defending and running mechanics as well as a shop and stats system. I had lots of fun making and its helped me expand my knowledge of C#.

projects.title: Fulcrum Website
projects.shortDescription: A minimalistic website & blog for my indie game studio.
projects.description: A clean website I made for my indie game studio. It is a simple website that displays information about the studio and its games. It is made in vanilla html, css, and js.

projects.title: Flourish Bot
projects.shortDescription: A fun private discord discord bot with features like fishing, blackjack, shop and more.
projects.description: A fun privates discord bot with features like fishing, blackjack, shop, and leaderboard status. I plan to continue to add more fleshed out features to the bot in my freetime. Since I dont plan to share this bot publicly and pay for databases and such, it currently uses a json database method where everything is stored locally in json files and dynamically updated as commands are executed.
